title: Easy School
description: Created a School Web App where User can find the required details about the school such as courses provided by the school, Holidays details etc and contact to the school for further commuication.

title: EasyBank Microservices
description: Created EasyBank Production-Ready Application which consists of three Microservies Accounts, Cards and Loans. Used Feign Client for invoking other microservice. Implemented Docker and Kubernates.
